column1: RT @rebecasrz: Miley I get you girl, our president is hot, but he is in a serious relationship with our VP The Ponytails, so please, back o…

Louis’s concert in Milan has been canceled... saw that coming... luckily my friend got two tickets for the show in Rome in July so I’ll see him anyways just gonna have to wait a few months but it’s fine coronavirus ain’t got nothing on ussss
